revised_title: Observations on the Gland-Cells of Dionaea muscipula during Secretion
tldr: The authors study the changes in gland-cells of Dionaea muscipula during the secretion process. They observe four distinct periods: resting, secretory, absorptive, and recovery. The gland-cells undergo structural changes, such as the movement of protoplasm and the formation of crystals, during these periods.
